languages.text: {n}Не отрываясь от клавиш, Соломон изрекает:{/n} "По крайней мере вам весело. Уже неплохо".
{n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
languages.original_text: {n}Не отрываясь от клавиш, Соломон изрекает:{/n} "По крайней мере вам весело. Уже неплохо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
{n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
{n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
{n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
{n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは鍵盤から目を離さないまま言った。{/n}「少なくともあなたは楽しんでいるようですね。不幸中の幸いです」
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは鍵盤から目を離さないまま言った。{/n}「少なくともあなたは楽しんでいるようですね。不幸中の幸いです」

languages.text: {n}Ohne den Blick von den Tasten abzuwenden, sagt Solomorne:{/n} "Wenigstens gefällt es Euch. Könnte schlimmer sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne den Blick von den Tasten abzuwenden, sagt Solomorne:{/n} "Wenigstens gefällt es Euch. Könnte schlimmer sein."

languages.text: {n}Sans quitter le clavier des yeux, Solomorne rétorque :{/n} « Au moins, vous vous amusez. Ça aurait pu être pire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans quitter le clavier des yeux, Solomorne rétorque :{/n} « Au moins, vous vous amusez. Ça aurait pu être pire. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne responde sin apartar la vista de las teclas:{/n} «Por lo menos lo está disfrutando. Podría ser peor».
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne responde sin apartar la vista de las teclas:{/n} «Por lo menos lo está disfrutando. Podría ser peor».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙开了口，视线一刻都未曾离开琴键。{/n}“至少你现在很开心，事情本可能会不尽人意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙开了口，视线一刻都未曾离开琴键。{/n}“至少你现在很开心，事情本可能会不尽人意。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini tuşlardan ayırmadan konuşuyor.{/n} "Hiç değilse keyif aldığınız muhakkak, daha beteri olabilirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gözlerini tuşlardan ayırmadan konuşur.{/n} "Hiç değilse keyif aldığınız muhakkak, daha beteri olabilirdi."

languages.original_text: {n}Without taking his eyes off the keys, Solomorne says,{/n} "At least you're enjoying yourself. Could be worse."
